sentences.en: A sense of period was evoked by complementing pictures with appropriate furniture.
sentences.cn: 给照片配上一些合适的家具，唤起了一种年代感。

sentences.en: A strict diet is appropriate for only a few.
sentences.cn: 严格的食谱仅对少数人适用.

sentences.en: Appropriate arrangements will be made for their work and livelihood.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作和生活会得到妥善安排.

sentences.en: Congress appropriated 5 million for International Women’s Year.
sentences.cn: 国会为国际妇女年拨款500万美元。

sentences.en: Dress neatly and attractively in an outfit appropriate to the job.
sentences.cn: 着装要整洁美观，适合于这份工作。

sentences.en: He is suspected of appropriating government funds .
sentences.cn: 他被怀疑挪用政府资金。

sentences.en: He is suspected of appropriating government funds.
sentences.cn: 他被怀疑挪用政府资金。

sentences.en: Her bright clothes were not appropriate for a funeral.
sentences.cn: 她那身鲜艳的衣服不适合参加葬礼.

sentences.en: I can assure you that appropriate action will be taken.
sentences.cn: 我向你保证会采取适当的行动。

sentences.en: It is appropriate that he should get the post.
sentences.cn: 由他担任这一职务是恰当的.

sentences.en: It is appropriate that Irish names dominate the list.
sentences.cn: 名单上大部分是爱尔兰名字，这没什么不合适的。

sentences.en: It seemed an appropriate place to end somehow.
sentences.cn: 不知怎的，似乎是到了该结束的合适时机了。

sentences.en: Mark box 1 or 2, as appropriate .
sentences.cn: 把方框1和2中的合适者标出来。

sentences.en: Most vacancies are at senior level, requiring appropriate qualifications.
sentences.cn: 大多数空缺属于高层职位，要求具备相应的资历。

sentences.en: Now that the problem has been identified, appropriate action can be taken.
sentences.cn: 现在既已找出问题的症结，即可采取适当行动。

sentences.en: Our boat would not have been appropriate for ocean voyaging.
sentences.cn: 我们的船只本不适合海上航行。

sentences.en: Place a tick in the appropriate box.
sentences.cn: 在相应的方框里打钩。

sentences.en: The appropriate word eluded him.
sentences.cn: 他找不到合适的字眼。

sentences.en: The intercom buzzed and he pressed down the appropriate switch.
sentences.cn: 对讲机发出嗡嗡声，他按下了相应的开关。

sentences.en: The timing of the announcement was particularly appropriate .
sentences.cn: 通告发布的时机很合适。

sentences.en: We should take appropriate measures to improve our teaching.
sentences.cn: 我们应当采取适当的措施提高教学质量.

sentences.en: Where appropriate , I delegate as much work as possible.
sentences.cn: 只要合适，我就尽量把工作分派出去。

trans.tran_en: correct or suitable for a particular time, situation, or purpose
